original_text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.
korean_text: 내가 아무도 못한 일을 그들 중에서 하지 아니하였더라면 그들에게 죄가 없었으려니와 지금은 그들이 나와 내 아버지를 보았고 또 미워하였도다

sentences.original_text: If I had not done among them the works
but now have they both seen
and hated both me and my Father
